description:
What is the Entity Framework ?

Do you want to develop Modern Web Application ?

Don’t want to waste time for building Application a lot ?

Do you love following last technology ?

What about LINQ to SQL ?

All of them is in this course...

All you need to build an application first create some entity classes.

And also create a context class to manage these entities.

Then write a simple linq query and your database is waiting for you ...

No need to create database in the Sql Server anymore. Your database will be created automaticly.

Building an application never can be easier so far...

Don’t hesitate to take this course.

Entity framework is an Object/Relational Mapping (O/RM) framework. It is an enhancement to ADO NET that gives developers an automated mechanism for accessing & storing the data in the database, and for working with the results.

Entity Framework 6 0 is the last technology of the Microsoft in the Data Access. Don't waste your time for communicating with the database. Adapt into other things in developing because after completing this course you will save time.

No need to have background for learning Entity Framework. This course is for any body both who want to upgrade himself with new technology or who want to start developing dynamic web application.

Our course starts by the basics of the Entity Framework and follows developing the core Entity Framework Code First Application.

What is the Entity Class?

What is the Context Class ?

How we connect to database ?

Do I have to create database in Sql Management Studio ?

Or Just Create your Classes then all Database jobs completed ?

How to write Linq to SQL Queries ?

Classic Sql Query or Linq to SQL ?

Visual Studio 2013 and Entity Framework 6 0.
title: Complete Entity Framework Code First : Asp net
